name: Oil Sweet Home
description:
Oil Sweet Home is an energetic survival, where it's dangerous to go alone.

Survive the apocalypse by gathering that sweet oil to power your last resort : your one and only rocket-fueled cabin.

Shooting at mechy-slimy ennemies and unraveling challenges that nature and ruins left behind, you can either run back and forth to fuel it safely, or risk your life in hope to get better rewards.

But don't get too far ! Or home safe light will leave you alone...
Pack-up enough fuel to rocket yourself far from the Storm, or meet your end within this violent fog.

Twin-stick gameplay :
Move with left joystick, shoot with the right one, and pass upon ressources to collect them.
Run back home to fill it with your new found liquid wealth.
Get to the next step & Repeat !

Credits: 

Bonjour de Montpellier, France. Worked on this project :

(Exyde/Slyvers) Balandjian Younes : Game Designer and visual asset maker (ui and 3D models)

(Moltenhead) Gardai Charlie : Sound Designer

(Serezia) Gouillon Clément : 3D artist and level-designer

(tmagnier) Magnier Thibaut : Game Developper

(hiroshi34) Teixeira Maxime : Game Developper

 

Thanks to Sud PICCEL organizing this super cool event, and to IONIS hosting it.
